tool_description: Easy to use and Powerful Sentiment Analysis and Topic Extractor API for any kind of review.
name: Review Analyzer
title: Review Analyzer

api_list.name: review-analyzer
api_list.description: Analyzes a given review semantically by Classifying into either following categories of Positive, Negative, Mixed or Neutral and extracts the relevant topics in the text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://review-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "review-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://review-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "review-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
